}} 'Calvin C. "Cal" Stoll' (December 12, 1923 – August 25, 2000) was an
American football player and coach. He served as the head coach at Wake Forest
University from 1969 to 1971 and at the University of Minnesota from 1972 to
1978, compiling a career college football record of 54–56.
categories: Wake Forest Demon Deacons football coaches
